data.title: Embers Turn To Flame (feat. Elodie Gervaise) Lyrics

data.meta_description: Embers Turn To Flame (feat. Elodie Gervaise) Lyrics by Alex Turr. Now, listen to all your favourite songs, along with the lyrics, only on JioSaavn.
data.text:
First I tried to run away Did underestimate you babe The power you′d obtained Then You came from far away In the early hours I waited Till you came and made my day So how can you be so sure of this thing Between me and you You pulled me in It's true Spinning spinning like i′m in a fire A sand storm of desire You've got me hooked like i'm no wiser Spinning we′re winning As you look me in the eyes And say that everything′s alright Our little embers Turn to fire These little embers turn to flame Writer(s): Alexis Turrel
